sections.text:
46-1636.Applicability of other law.

The Safety of Dams and Reservoirs Act does not relieve the owner or operator of a dam or reservoir from obtaining any necessary approvals from the Chief Water Officer under sections 46-233 to 46-241 or from any other local, state, or federal regulatory authority.

SourceLaws 2005, LB 335, ยง 36;Laws 2025, LB317, ยง 277.Operative Date: July 1, 2025
